author: mturk
msg: Make sense out of ci directory

author: zhoukevin
msg: Fix a defect of java.beans.Introspector class: If a class provides explicit BeanInfo about itself then we add that to the BeanInfo information we obtained from analyzing any derived classes. In addition, add a test case for recreation.

author: markt
msg: Update migration doc for xml validation changes

author: markt
msg: Simplify xml validation configuration. It is now configurable per context and can be set per host using a host-level context.xml file so remove the attributes on the host.
If running with STRICT_SERVLET_COMPLIANCE, enable validation by default.
